thread.section_title: ALittleLuxury.com.au Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ALittleLuxury.com.au | alittleluxury.com.au
thread.title: John Robinson

author: John Robinson
title: John Robinson
text: We were struggling to find an alternative present for our daughter who lives in Australia (we are in the UK) when we found the web site. Looking through all the various options we were very pleasantly surprised to see just how good it was and with lots of variation too. We chose the hamper so she could go on picnics etc. and were delighted to see that there were plenty of options to add/delete/change the contents so we ended up with a great present which our daughter (and her work mates) was thrilled with. Delivery was "spot on" and we were kept notified all the way from placing the order to its final delivery. A great experience for us and one we hope to use again. John & Jo Robinson
